name: NATS JetStream KV Watch 最小
description: JetStream KV を watch して更新を受け取る。

files.template:
const { connect } = require('nats');
(async ()=>{ const nc = await connect({ servers: '{{server}}' }); const js = await nc.jetstream(); const kv = await js.views.kv('config'); const w = await kv.watch(); (async ()=>{ for await (const e of w) console.log('kv', e.key); })(); await kv.put('hello', Buffer.from('world')); })();
